attributes.action: Save The Rovers Return in Coronation Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The makers of Coronation Street have announced that in the Summer their fictional pub The Rovers Return is to close for a refurbishment and open again as a wine bar or theme pub, I would like to urge the writers and producers of Coronation Stret to think again, Coronation Street is loved by millions of viewers and The Rovers Return is an integral part of the programme, Coronation Street without The Rovers Return would be unthinkable and I urge people to sign up and help us save The Rovers Return

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
